title: Fashionably late: Saudi hosts its first fashion week
text:
Fashionably late: Saudi hosts its first fashion week 10:54am BST - 02:30 
Saudi Arabia’s first-ever fashion week has kicked off in the capital Riyadh as social restrictions ease in the ultra-conservative kingdom. Reuters’ Emily Wither reports from the capital.
